panels.title: Meet Samsung People
panels.sub: Whatever you're looking for on Samsung.com, Samsung People are here to help you make the right choice. Enjoy live video demos and get expert advice, all from the comfort of home.

panels.title: Introducing Samsung Bespoke fridges
panels.sub: Designed for you, by you; Samsungâ€™s brand new Bespoke refrigerators are available in 14 different colours, so they can be mixed and matched to fit your own unique lifestyle.

text: Every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 5pm until 9th July

Join our live broadcast to see a demonstration of the brand new Bespoke fridge, along with an interactive Q&A session with our product experts. You will also receive an exclusive offer on the day.* Broadcasts will run every Mon, Tues & Fri from 28th June - 9th July.

*Purchase from Samsung Shop Online. Savings based on regular Samsung.com price. Unique Code to be used at checkout and the discount will automatically be applied when one, two or more qualifying products, accumulative promos can be applied. While stocks last. T&Cs apply
